name: Elzzup
description:
In Elzzup, your goal isn't to assemble a puzzle, but rather to disassemble it! But you can't simply take out any puzzle tile you want...



As you progress through the game, a variety of different tiles will appear, each with their own rules, making the puzzle deconstruction rather more complex, especially when those tiles interact with each other in unforeseen ways.



Locked tiles, directional tiles, rotating tiles, and many more await you in this logic game.

This game was primarily designed as a casual, relaxing experience, with no game over, limited life system or timer of any kind, but I hope and think it will still be interesting for people looking for a challenge, as the later levels can be quite complex.

Please feel free to try the demo before buying the game!
